entity.rdfs:label: SMI Population
entity.im:definition:
{"@id":"urn:uuid:6d517466-813b-46a8-b848-aaf5a4fbdcbf","name":"SMI Population","description":"Adults 18+ with SMI","match":{"entityType":{"name":"Patient","@id":"http://endhealth.info/im#Patient"},"subsetOf":[{"@id":"im:Q_RegisteredGMS","rdf:type":[{"@id":"im:Profile"}],"rdfs:label":"Patients registered for GMS services on the reference date","rdfs:comment":"The type of agent involved"}],"and":[{"name":"Regular patient type and Age years >18","@id":"urn:uuid:cebe3297-5f54-4556-81f0-0ca14f27922e","and":[{"property":{"name":"GP patient type","@id":"http://endhealth.info/im#gpPatientType"},"valueIn":[{"name":"RegularRegular GMS patient","@id":"urn:uuid:53ecbd7e-5b1b-43ba-9a22-c9a70c9a4c28"}],"valueVar":"gpPatientType1"},{"property":{"@id":"im:age","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:ObjectProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"Age","rdfs:comment":""},"valueCompare":{"comparison":"GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL","valueData":"18"},"valueVar":"age2","function":{"id":{"@id":"http://endhealth.info/im#AgeFunction"},"argument":[{"parameter":"units","value":"YEAR"},{"parameter":"fromDate","value":"dateOfBirth3"},{"parameter":"referenceDate","value":"$referenceDate"}]}},{"property":{"@id":"im:dateOfBirth","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:DatatypeProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"date of birth","rdfs:comment":"Date of birth of the patient, as far as is known"},"valueVar":"dateOfBirth3"}]},{"@id":"urn:uuid:36817d95-6552-43f1-9c7a-85c46b1a77b5","property":{"@id":"im:isSubjectOf","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:ObjectProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"is subject of ","rdfs:comment":"references the event which this person is the subject of"},"valueObject":{"name":"Serious mental illness (not resolved)","entityType":{"@id":"im:Observation","rdf:type":[{"@id":"sh:NodeShape"},{"@id":"rdfs:Class"}],"rdfs:label":"Observation (entry type)","rdfs:comment":"An observation is considered a type of health event that records some characteristic of the patient or some procedure performed on the patient, excluding the specialised events such as medication.

An observation in Discovery is much broader than an observation in FHIR. Because observations may be highly specialised, like encounters, only the generic properties are illustrated in this document.

The type of observation is deduced from the observation concept itself.

Observations may be linked at any level of nesting. In particular, tests and concept results observations are considered as 2 separate but linked observations, one for the test, the other for the result. This varies the Discovery observation model from the FHIR model that includes both test and result in the same observation.

For example, a blood pressure would be modelled as 3 observations as follows:

Observation 1Blood pressure

Observation 2Systolic blood pressure value= 120, part of observation 1

Observation 3Diastolic blood pressure value= 80, part of observation 2"},"property":{"@id":"im:concept","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:ObjectProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"codeable expression","rdfs:comment":"Points to the expression concept that a particular instance entry is generally about e.g. the type of entry such as Angina, Systolic bp, or GP consultation, or allergy to pencicillin Sub properties of the entru may point to more specialised value sets"},"valueIn":[{"@id":"urn:uuid:837c474c-f6af-4a05-83ad-7c4ee7557e11","rdf:type":[{"@id":"im:ConceptSet"}],"rdfs:label":"Significant Mental Illness (Resolved)","rdfs:comment":""},{"@id":"urn:uuid:8ab86afb-94e0-45fc-9875-3d16705cf41c","rdf:type":[{"@id":"im:ConceptSet"}],"rdfs:label":"Significant Mental Illness","rdfs:comment":""}],"valueVar":"concept4","sortLimit":{"orderBy":{"@id":"im:effectiveDate","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:DatatypeProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"effective `date","rdfs:comment":"The effective date (with or without a time) that is relevant to the event being described (and not related to the entry date into the system). For events that last a period of time, the date is the start date"},"direction":"DESCENDING","test":[{"property":{"@id":"im:concept","rdf:type":[{"@id":"owl:ObjectProperty"}],"rdfs:label":"codeable expression","rdfs:comment":"Points to the expression concept that a particular instance entry is generally about e.g. the type of entry such as Angina, Systolic bp, or GP consultation, or allergy to pencicillin Sub properties of the entru may point to more specialised value sets"},"valueIn":[{"@id":"urn:uuid:8ab86afb-94e0-45fc-9875-3d16705cf41c","rdf:type":[{"@id":"im:ConceptSet"}],"rdfs:label":"Significant Mental Illness","rdfs:comment":""}],"valueVar":"concept5"}]}}}]}}
